title: Trial By Fire
description: Dont get burned... Lieutenant Howard "Six- Pack" Paxton loves three being a firefighter, riding his Harley, and his bachelorhood. That is, until the curvaceous Kat McKenna falls into his arms at the scene of a fire-and melts the six-foot-six tower of bronze muscle...But just as passion ignites between them-and they explore new heights of ecstasy-a ruthless arsonist with a deadly secret and a thirst for vengeance becomes their worst nightmare.
author: Jo Davis
